sentences.sContent: the US edition of Marie Claire magazine
Martin was reading the early edition of the Evening News.
sentences.sCn: 马丁在看《新闻晚报》的早间版

sentences.sContent: The textbook was first published in 1858 and is now in its 39th edition.
sentences.sCn: 该课本初版于1858年，现在已经是第39版了。

sentences.sContent: ...His advice was emphasized by the words on the back of the final edition of The Whole Earth Catalog...
...The shortcomings of traditional print edition textbooks are obvious: For starters they're heavy...
...The American Psychiatric Association may consider listing Internet addiction in the next edition of its diagnostic manual...

exam.question: The author was required to submit an _____ of about 200 words together with his research paper.

answer.explain: submit an abstract： 提交一份摘要。 句意： 作者需要在提交研究论文的同时， 提交一份200词左右的论文摘要。 edition： 版本； editorial： 社论； article： 文章。

phrases.pCn: 发行额有限的限定版（通常为装订精美者）

trans.tranOther: the form that a book, newspaper, magazine etc is produced in
